text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Trump: "We have tremendous testing capacity."

"During a conference call where Trump presented his guidelines ... state leaders told the president they were still struggling to secure enough complete testing kits and were worried about a second spike." https://t.co/5mlHJiKKJQ
